Text: This actually belongs in the regular movie section, there's plenty of skin but nothing hardcore.  Also there's no incest, just a woman raped by a father & his son, then she seeks revenge against them.

Indeed. Moved to Video > Movies.

http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0107572/
Actually the imdb info is for the wrong title.  This movie is actually 'Daughter of Darkness II'.
